Momo: If you have a link to a story, would you post it? I'd like to share it with a few PMK communities (if it already hasn't been put there.)

>Shinsengumi manga which I expect is only "Getsumeiseiki".(cry) 

Well, there is Burai - but that too is still plodding along.  Mmm. Perhaps we should all harass Watsuki-sensei to pick up his Shinsengumi manga idea after all.  


>By the way, has "SHOJO BEAT" MAGAZINE already become the center of 
>attention here?
>It is the Shojo manga magazine which BIZ will publish in July, this 
>year. 
>The series of Kaze Hikaru is determined by the magazine. 
>
><http://www.viz.com/news/newsroom/2005/02_shojobeat.php>http://www.viz.com/news/newsroom/2005/02_shojobeat.php

I did mention this, but there isn't much to discuss at the moment.  The bad news about Viz is their turnaround time from serial publication into graphic novel format.   Regardless, I remain hopeful that Viz will stick with its commitment to KnH, unlike the other manga companies which have dropped titles after publishing one volume of a series.   In the U.S., it is one of the most stable and long-existing publication companies around.

S
